Macon.First Presbyterian Church (Macon, Georgi:
First Presbyterian Church is a historic Presbyterian church in Macon, GA.


== History ==
The place was frequently visited by Mr. Joseph C. Stiles, a licentiate and Evangelist of Hopewell Presbytery, who took it in as a part of his field. As the fruit of his ministry a church was organized June 18, 1826, of twenty five members, by Rev.
